original_title: Bassie & Adriaan: Het geheim van de sleutel
overview: Bassie and Adriaan take a well-earned holiday but find themselves chased by two diamond thieves, referred to as B1 and B2. The crooks mistake Bassie for the go-between who came to collect the key to the vault of the stolen diamonds.
title: Bassie & Adriaan: The Secret of the Key
